rawls.scene.params¶

Generic class which store module params information

Classes

Params(module, name, params_names, …)

Generic class which store module params information
class rawls.scene.params.Params(module, name, params_names, params_values, params_types)[source]¶

Generic class which store module params information

module¶

{str} – name of the module

name¶

{str} – name of the kind of module used

params_name¶

[{str}] – parameters names of module used

params_values¶

[{str}] – parameters values of module used

params_types¶

[{str}] – parameters values of module used

get_param(name)[source]¶

Get specific param value using its name

Parameters

name – {str} – expected param name

Returns

{(str|float|int)} – returns param value with its specific type

get_params()[source]¶

Get information about available params

Returns

[{str}] – list of available params for this module

to_rawls()[source]¶

Display module information for .rawls file

Returns

{str} – module information for .rawls file
